sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Import Historic NeedIt Data">f871919c93650210fec474dcebba1036</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    // If the source data does not have a employee_email field,
    // create the target email address from the Employee field value. Email addresses
    // have the format firstname. lastname@example.com. Convert the u_employee
    // value to lowercase. Replace the space with a . and concatenate with
    // @example.com
    if (!("employee_email" in source)) {
        var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
        target.requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
    }
})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-09 19:13:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>e6791d5493a50210fec474dcebba109d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onStart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Innovate + Needit" source="x_1131426_innovate">5cfa5a1197d231107b8c9934a253aff3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Innovate + Needit">5cfa5a1197d231107b8c9934a253aff3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_e6791d5493a50210fec474dcebba109d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-09 19:16:12</sys_updated_on><when>onStart</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
